text: Blume in Love is a 1973 American romantic comedy movie directed by Paul Mazursky (who also stars) and also starring George Segal, Susan Anspach, Kris Kristofferson, Marsha Mason, Shelley Winters, Ed Peck, Shelley Morrison. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Venice
title: Blume in Love
